name: Twin Stick Dungeon
description:
Hey! I made this game with around 20 hours of development time for Shape Jam 2019, a 72 hour jam . It might expand some day to include things like more levels, more abilities, graphics, and audio, who knows.

The game supports mouse and keyboard or game pad.

Some Controls:

Move - WASD/Arrows or Left Stick

Shoot - Mouse (Aim + Left Click) or Right Stick

There's one dungeon with one boss.

Sometimes a collision error means you're invincible for the rest of the game. If that happens, congrats!

If it doesn't happen, don't be discouraged by death. Enemies don't heal or respawn when you die, so keep at it and you'll get there.
